sourcesContent:
import { TableContainer, Paper, Table, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell, Typography, ListItem } from "@mui/material"; import { useStoreContext } from "../../App/Context/StoreContext"; import { Basket } from "../../App/Models/Basket"; export default function BasketSummary() { const {basket} = useStoreContext(); const subtotal = basket?.items.reduce((sum, item) => sum + (item.quantity*item.price), 0) ?? 0;; const deliveryFee = subtotal > 100 ? 0 : 15; return ( <> Subtotal ${subtotal.toFixed()} Delivery fee* ${deliveryFee} Total ${subtotal + deliveryFee} *Orders over $100 qualify for free delivery
) }
